SmoothFramerate: Enable smoothing at the cost of some performance
CorpseCount: Maximum number of corpses is 32, 16 is selected for a balanced approach
MaxFrameLatency: Driver can queue up to 4 frames
SerializeRender: 0 is the default for the best performance, 1 and 2 improve latency but require a powerful CPU.
VideoMemory: Target all of the available VRAM to reduce stuttering
TextureQualityBakedSunShadows: Slightly reduced baked sun shadow quality
SpotShadowTextureSize: Spot light shadow resolution set to 1024
OmniShadowTextureSize: Omni (point) light shadow resolution set to 256
VolumetricLightingMaxSunSamples: Max sun samples for volumetric lighting
VolumetricLightingMaxLightSamples: Max light samples for volumetric lighting
SSAOTechnique: Ambient occlusion set to GTAO Low Quality
StreamMinResident: No reduction in minimum asset residency in VRAM

SmoothFramerate: Disable smoothing to minimize frame delay
CorpseCount: Maximum number of corpses is 32, 16 is selected for a balanced approach
MaxFrameLatency: Driver can only queue up to 1 frame
SerializeRender: 0 is the default for the best performance, 1 and 2 improve latency but require a powerful CPU.
VideoMemory: Target 75% the available VRAM to increase performance
Vsync: Vertical sync disabled for lower latency
TextureQualityBakedSunShadows: Slightly reduced baked sun shadow quality
SpotShadowTextureSize: Spot light shadow resolution set to 1024
OmniShadowTextureSize: Omni (point) light shadow resolution set to 256
VolumetricLightingMaxSunSamples: Max sun samples for volumetric lighting
VolumetricLightingMaxLightSamples: Max light samples for volumetric lighting
SSAOTechnique: Ambient occlusion set to GTAO Low Quality
StreamMinResident: Reduce the minimum asset residency in VRAM
